content.raw: I believe that `current` task is 3 in the beginning of `OnUpdate`, then it runs `Task::Update` on task 3 and checks that the last checkpoint is complete, so that changes `Task::CurrentCheckpointId` to zero. Which causes `if (i == this->current && j >= this->tasks[i-1]->CurrentCheckpointId())` to be true, skipping the score count for the whole task 3.
